content:
There are many tour companies that offer guided tours of historical landmarks in Egypt. Here are some options:

1. Intrepid Travel offers a range of tours in Egypt that include visits to historical landmarks.

2. G Adventures offers small-group tours of Egypt that include visits to historical landmarks.

3. Egypt Tours Plus offers customizable private tours of Egypt that can be tailored to include visits to specific historical landmarks.

4. Memphis Tours offers a variety of guided tours of Egypt that cover many historical landmarks.

5. Abercrombie & Kent offers luxury tours of Egypt that include visits to historical landmarks.

It is a good idea to research different tour companies and read reviews before choosing the one that best fits your needs and interests.
